about_the_game:
This kinetic visual novel is a short story that will brighten your evening and perhaps make you think.

Description:


Not many know that angels—the young souls—live up in the clouds. There, they await their turn to be reborn into the world. Yet that fate is only reserved for the purest among them, and the corrupted angels fall to the ground with the rain.

One day, Luke decides to take a peek at what's down there, on the earth, and his cloud descends. Having done that, he disturbed the peace of his brothers and sisters, and it's getting more and more difficult to keep grace in the Heavens. Will he be able to return things to normal?

Game features:


  • Short, but breath-taking story that will immerse you in a unique world
  • Pastel-colored graphics, supplemented with animations, that will make you float in the heavens along with the game's characters
  • An original soundtrack permeated with grace
